data.comment: Didier Ndong (Dijon) has been booked during the half time break!
The first-half is just kicking off.
At Groupama Stadium, Dijon are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lyon.
Benoit Millot awards Dijon a goal kick.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 5, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Lyon are pushing forward but Bruno Guimaraes's finish is wide of the goal.
Dijon have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Dijon.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 11, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dijon take a 0-1 lead thanks to Aurelien Scheidler.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Dijon at Groupama Stadium.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Dijon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 22, Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dijon's half?
Dijon are caught offside.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Dijon at Groupama Stadium.
Benoit Millot signals a Dijon throw-in in Lyon's half.
Lyon pushes forward through Moussa Dembele, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a Lyon throw-in in Dijon's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Lyon are coming forward and Memphis Depay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benoit Millot awards Dijon a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 26, Lyon drives forward and Maxwel Cornet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Dijon at Groupama Stadium.
Dijon have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Dijon at Groupama Stadium.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In the minute 33, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Lyon's Leo Dubois is on target but unsuccessful.
Lyon's Bruno Guimaraes misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Penalty! Benoit Millot points to the spot, great chance for Lyon...
In the minute 37, Throw-in Lyon.
Ahmad Ngouyamsa (Dijon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Memphis Depay equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 40, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 43, Memphis Depay of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Wesley Lautoa gives Lyon a 2-1 lead.
Goal! Memphis Depay extends Lyon's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Lyon.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 49, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Moussa Dembele of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Benoit Millot awards Dijon a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Dijon to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 53, Lyon's Moussa Dembele breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Lyon surge into the attack at Groupama Stadium but Marceloâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dijon make their first substitution with Jonathan Panzo replacing Ahmad Ngouyamsa.
In the minute 55, Stephane Jobard is making the team's second substitution at Groupama Stadium with Frederic Sammaritano replacing Mounir Chouiar.
Dijon have a dangerous throw-in.
Benoit Millot signals a Dijon throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Lyon.
In Lyon Dijon attack through Romain Amalfitano. The finish is off target, however.
Benoit Millot awards Lyon a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a penalty...
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lyon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 65, Dijon's Frederic Sammaritano has been booked in Lyon.
Lyon are going well in Lyon. They now lead 4-1 thanks to a Memphis Depay penalty.
The home team replace Karl Toko Ekambi with Jeff Reine-Adelaide.
In the minute 68, Memphis Depay (Lyon) gets a yellow card.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Rayan Cherki replacing Memphis Depay.
The home team have replaced Leo Dubois with Kenny Tete. This is the third substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Mihai Dobre is replacing Romain Amalfitano for Dijon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 71, Stephane Jobard is making the team's fourth substitution at Groupama Stadium with Anibal Chala replacing Jordan Marie.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Dijon.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 75, Moussa Dembele for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Lyon.
Free kick Lyon.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 79, Melvin Bard is on a sub for Maxwel Cornet for Lyon.
The home team have replaced Fernando Marcal with Joachim Andersen. This is the fifth substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Rayan Philippe is replacing Aurelien Scheidler for the away team.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Moussa Dembele (Lyon) has received a yellow card from Benoit Millot.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 81, Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 83, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot blows against Dijon's Anibal Chala for offside.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Benoit Millot signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Lyon's area.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
Marcelo for Lyon has been booked by Benoit Millot and receives a first yellow card.
